title: The Legends of Malibu
brief_description: Relive the magic of Malibu as legendary surfers document the birth of a lifestyle, a cultural revolution based on sunshine, surfing and good vibrations. Featuring renowned surfers such as Mike Doyle, Wayne Miyata, Lance Carson, Mickey Dora, Mike Hynson and hosted by the legendary Corky Carroll, featuring music by The Beach Boys, The Surfaris and Surf Raiders.
